name: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont and starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman. The Shawshank Redemption is based on the novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption by Stephen King and tells the story of banker Andy Dufresne (Robbins), who is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary for the murder of his wife and her lover despite his claims of innocence. Over the course of his time at Shawshank, Andy befriends fellow prisoner Red (Freeman) and finds ways to make his time incarcerated more bearable. When Andy discovers that the warden is engaged in illegal activities, he uses his knowledge to blackmail the warden and gain his freedom. The Shawshank Redemption was a critical and commercial success, grossing over $58 million at the box office and receiving seven Academy Award nominations, including Best Picture.

name: The Godfather
synopsis: The Godfather is a 1972 American crime drama directed by Francis Ford Coppola and produced by Albert S. Ruddy, based on Mario Puzo's best-selling novel of the same name. It stars Marlon Brando and Al Pacino as the leaders of the Corleone crime family. The story, spanning 1945 to 1955, chronicles the family under the patriarch Vito Corleone (Brando), focusing on the transformation of Michael Corleone (Pacino) from reluctant family outsider to ruthless mafia boss.The Godfather received universally positive reviews from critics. It was a commercial success, becoming the highest-grossing film of 1972 and was for a time the highest-grossing film ever made. It won the Oscars for Best Picture, Best Actor (Brando) and Best Adapted Screenplay (for Puzo and Coppola). Its seven other Oscar nominations included Pacino, James Caan and Robert Duvall for Best Supporting Actor and Coppola for Best Director.The Godfather is widely regarded as one of the greatest films in world cinema. It was selected for preservation in the U.S. National Film Registry in 1990, being deemed "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant" and is ranked the second-greatest film in American cinema (behind Citizen Kane) by the American Film Institute. Its influence on the film industry has been considerable. The film was followed by two sequels: The Godfather Part II (1974) and The Godfather Part III (1990).

name: The Dark Knight
synopsis: The Dark Knight is a 2008 superhero film directed, produced, and co-written by Christopher Nolan. Based on the DC Comics character Batman, the film is the second part of Nolan's The Dark Knight Trilogy and a sequel to 2005's Batman Begins. Christian Bale stars as Bruce Wayne / Batman, alongside Michael Caine, Heath Ledger, Gary Oldman, Aaron Eckhart, Maggie Gyllenhaal, and Morgan Freeman. In the film, Bruce Wayne raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and DA Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham City. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker, who thrusts Gotham into anarchy and forces Batman closer to crossing the fine line between hero and vigilante.

name: The Godfather: Part II
synopsis: The Godfather Part II is a 1974 American epic crime film produced and directed by Francis Ford Coppola from a screenplay co-written with Mario Puzo, starring Al Pacino and Robert De Niro. Partially based on Puzo's 1969 novel The Godfather, the film is both a sequel and a prequel to The Godfather, presenting parallel dramas. The Godfather Part II was released in 1974 to universal acclaim and became the first sequel to win the Academy Award for Best Picture.In the early 1900s, young Vito Andolini is born in Sicily and emigrates with his family to the United States. Vito grows up on the mean streets of New York City's Little Italy, where he becomes a skilled street fighter and earns the nickname "The Butcher's Boy". Vito's friend, Genco Abbandando, introduces him to the world of organized crime, and Vito quickly establishes himself as a rising star in the New York Mafia.Meanwhile, in 1917, a young Vito Corleone is living a life of poverty in Sicily. One day, he witnesses his father, Antonio Andolini, being brutally murdered by a local mafia boss. Vito flees Sicily for America, where he changes his name to "Vito Corleone" and begins to build a new life.In the present day, middle-aged Vito Corleone is the most powerful Mafia boss in America. His son, Michael Corleone, has returned from military service and is now a successful businessman. However, Michael is increasingly drawn into the family business, and he eventually becomes the new head of the Corleone crime family.As Michael expands the Corleone family's power and influence, he faces challenges from rival families, the government, and his own conscience. Meanwhile, the aging Vito is still active in the family business, but his health is failing. As Vito's health deteriorates, he begins to reminisce about his life in Sicily and his journey to America.The Godfather Part II is a powerful and timeless film about the nature of power, family, and violence.

name: 12 Angry Men
synopsis: A group of 12 jurors are tasked with deciding the fate of a young man accused of murder. After a long and heated debate, the jurors come to a unanimous verdict of not guilty.

name: Schindler's List
synopsis: Schindler's List tells the story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who owned a factory in Nazi-occupied Poland. During the Holocaust, Schindler saved the lives of more than a thousand Jewish people by employing them in his factory.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
synopsis: The movie is the third and final installment in The Lord of the Rings trilogy. The movie begins with Gandalf, Aragorn, and the rest of the Fellowship of the Ring arriving in Minas Tirith, the capital of Gondor. They are there to help defend the city against the armies of Sauron. Sauron's forces are led by the Witch-king of Angmar, and they are outnumbered. However, they are able to drive the enemy back and win the battle.The movie then shifts to Mount Doom, where Frodo and Sam are trying to destroy the One Ring. They are accompanied by Gollum, who is also trying to get the Ring. Gollum eventually gets the Ring from Frodo, but Frodo is able to get it back. Gollum then falls into the lava and dies.With the Ring destroyed, Sauron is defeated and the armies of Mordor flee. Aragorn then takes his rightful place as the king of Gondor. The movie ends with the members of the Fellowship going their separate ways.

name: Pulp Fiction
synopsis: In Pulp Fiction, two mob hitmen, Vincent Vega and Jules Winnfield, are on a mission to retrieve a briefcase for their boss. Meanwhile, Vincent's boss's wife, Mia Wallace, is having an affair with Vincent. But when Mia overdoses on heroin, Vincent has to take her to his boss's house. Things go awry when Jules and Vincent start arguing over the rules of a new game they're playing.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
synopsis: The movie tells the story of the Hobbits, a peaceful race of small people, and their quest to destroy the One Ring, a ring that gives its wearer absolute power. The ring was created by the Dark Lord Sauron, and it is this quest that forms the basis of the movie. The movie follows the Hobbits as they travel through treacherous lands, encountering many perils along the way. The movie culminates with the Hobbits reaching the Crack of Doom, where the ring must be destroyed.

name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
synopsis: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly is a 1966 American Western film directed by Sergio Leone and starring Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, and Eli Wallach in their respective title roles. The screenplay was written by Age & Scarpelli, Luciano Vincenzoni, and Leone, based on a story by Vincenzoni and Leone. The film is an Italian-American co-production, shot on location in Spain and Italy, and was released in the United States in 1967.The film's plot revolves around three gunslingers competing to find a fortune in Confederate gold buried in a cemetery; the story takes place during the American Civil War. While the film's title refers to the three main characters, The Good, the Bad and the Ugly is commonly referred to as a "spaghetti Western" because of its Italian production, which Leone co-wrote with Sergio Donati based on a story by Vincenzoni and Leone.The Good, the Bad and the Ugly was a commercial success, grossing over $25 million at the box office, and is considered one of the greatest films of all time. The film was the third and final installment of Leone's Dollars Trilogy, following A Fistful of Dollars and For a Few Dollars More.

name: Forrest Gump
synopsis: Forrest Gump is a simple man with a low I.Q. who has accomplished great things in his life and been present for some of the most momentous events in recent history. Despite his mental challenges, Forrest is a loving, loyal and determined individual who goes through life with his heart in the right place. The film chronicles his journey through three decades, telling the stories of his childhood in the 1950s, his experiences in the Vietnam War in the 1960s, and his life in the following years, including his meeting with President John F. Kennedy, his involvement in the Watergate scandal, and his reunion with his childhood sweetheart, Jenny. Forrest Gump is a heartwarming and inspirational story of a man who has overcome all odds to live an extraordinary life.

name: Fight Club
synopsis: The movie Fight Club is about a man named Tyler Durden who starts a fight club in order to feel alive. The club becomes a way for men to release their aggression and feel empowered. However, as the club grows in popularity, it becomes clear that Tyler is using it as a way to control people. When the Narrator, who is the main character, begins to realize this, he tries to stop Tyler. This leads to a final showdown between the two men.

name: Inception
synopsis: Dom Cobb is a professional thief with the rare ability to enter people's dreams and steal their secrets from their subconscious. His skill has made him a coveted player in the world of corporate espionage, but it has also cost him everything he loves. Cobb gets a chance at redemption when he is offered a seemingly impossible task: planting an idea in someone's mind. If he succeeds, it will be the perfect crime, but a dangerous enemy anticipates Cobb's every move.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
synopsis: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is the second movie in the Lord of the Rings trilogy. The movie opens with the members of the Fellowship of the Ring being split up. Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli go to search for Merry and Pippin, who have been kidnapped by orcs. Meanwhile, Frodo and Sam continue their journey to destroy the One Ring in Mount Doom. They are joined by Gollum, who is secretly plotting to betray them.The movie follows the different members of the Fellowship as they all battle the forces of evil. Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli fight their way through hordes of orcs to rescue Merry and Pippin. Frodo and Sam struggle to keep the One Ring from Gollum, who is constantly trying to steal it. In the end, Gollum finally gets his hands on the Ring and falls into the lava of Mount Doom, destroying the Ring and himself.

name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
synopsis: The movie begins with Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Princess Leia, Chewbacca, and C-3PO on the run from the Empire. They are forced to land on the planet Hoth to avoid detection, and soon find themselves under attack by the Empire's forces. Luke is separated from the others and forced to face Darth Vader, the Empire's deadliest enforcer. Vader severely injures Luke, but is forced to retreat when the rest of the rebel forces arrive. Han and Leia are forced to flee the planet, while Luke is taken to the Rebel base on the planet Dagobah to recover.

name: The Matrix
synopsis: Thomas A. Anderson is a man living two lives. By day he is an average computer programmer and by night a hacker known as Neo. Neo has always questioned his reality, but the truth is far beyond his imagination. Neo finds himself targeted by the police when he is contacted by Morpheus, a legendary computer hacker branded a terrorist by the government. Morpheus awakens Neo to the real world, a ravaged wasteland where most of humanity have been captured by a race of machines that live off of the humans' body heat and electrochemical energy and who imprison their minds within an artificial reality known as the Matrix. As a rebel against the machines, Neo must return to the Matrix and confront the agents: super-powerful computer programs devoted to snuffing out Neo and the entire human rebellion.

name: Goodfellas
synopsis: In the movie Goodfellas, Henry Hill is a small time hoodlum who aspires to be a made man in the Mafia. He befriends Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito, and they start working for Paulie Cicero. They eventually move up the ranks and become involved in organized crime. However, their criminal activities eventually catch up to them and they all end up in jail.

name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
synopsis: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest is a 1975 American drama film directed by MiloÅ¡ Forman, based on the 1962 novel One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest by Ken Kesey. The film stars Jack Nicholson as Randle McMurphy, an antihero who is admitted to a psychiatric hospital for evaluation. There, he meets a number of colorful characters, including the tyrannical Nurse Ratched, and eventually leads the other patients in a revolt against the authorities. The film was nominated for nine Academy Awards, winning five, including Best Picture, Best Actor (Nicholson), Best Actress (Louise Fletcher), Best Director (Forman), and Best Adapted Screenplay (Lawrence Hauben and Bo Goldman).

name: Se7en
synopsis: When two detectives are assigned to track down a serial killer who chooses his victims based on the seven deadly sins, they are in for the case of a lifetime. As they race against the clock to solve the murders, they realize that the killer is one step ahead of them. With time running out, they must put their differences aside and work together to catch the killer before he strikes again.

name: Seven Samurai
synopsis: A group of seven masterless samurai are hired to defend a small village from a band of ruthless bandits. The samurai train the villagers in the art of warfare and together they build a strong defense. When the bandits finally attack, the village is ready and the samurai fight fiercely to protect their new home. In the end, only three of the seven samurai survive, but the village is saved.

name: It's a Wonderful Life
synopsis: It's a Wonderful Life is a classic holiday movie about a man, George Bailey, who is down on his luck and suicidal. An angel, Clarence, is sent to help him and show him what life would be like without him. George is shown how different his town, his family, and his life would be without him and he realizes how valuable he is. The movie ends with George being surrounded by the people who love him and who he has helped throughout his life.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
synopsis: The Silence of the Lambs is a movie about a young FBI trainee who is tasked with catching a serial killer who is murdering young women. She enlists the help of a cannibalistic serial killer who is in prison. Together they catch the killer.

name: City of God
synopsis: The film is set in the favelas of Rio de Janeiro in the 1970s. It tells the story of how the drug trade began and how it quickly spiraled out of control. The film follows the lives of several young men who are caught up in the violence and bloodshed of the drug trade. As the film progresses, the violence and bloodshed become more and more prevalent, and the young men are forced to choose between survival and death.

name: Saving Private Ryan
synopsis: The movie is set during the invasion of Normandy in World War II. U.S. Army Rangers Captain John Miller (Tom Hanks) and his men are tasked with finding Private James Ryan (Matt Damon), who is the last surviving brother of four servicemen. The men search through the battlefields and eventually find Ryan, who has been hiding in a foxhole. They then help him escape the enemy and return him to his unit.

name: Life Is Beautiful
synopsis: In the film Life Is Beautiful, Guido and Dora live in Italy with their son, GiosuÃ¨. The family is happy until the outbreak of World War II. Dora is Jewish, and when the Nazis begin rounding up Jews in the town, Guido manages to hide Dora and GiosuÃ¨ in a basement. To keep GiosuÃ¨ from becoming too scared, Guidopretends that the whole thing is a game. They are eventually found and sent to a concentration camp, where Guido is killed. Dora and GiosuÃ¨ survive the war and are reunited.

name: The Green Mile
synopsis: The movie The Green Mile is set on death row in a Louisiana prison in the 1930s. Paul Edgecomb is the prison guard who is in charge of the death row inmates. One day, a new inmate named John Coffey arrives. Coffey is a giant of a man who is accused of brutally murdering two young girls. Edgecomb initially believes that Coffey is guilty, but he soon realizes that there is more to Coffey than meets the eye. Coffey has a special gift that allows him to heal people with just a touch. As Edgecomb gets to know Coffey, he begins to believe that Coffey is innocent of the crimes he has been accused of. When another inmate on death row is executed, Coffey takes the man's place on the electric chair. Edgecomb is convinced that Coffey is going to be executed for a crime he didn't commit, and he races against time to try to prove Coffey's innocence.

name: Star Wars
synopsis: The movie is set in a galaxy far, far away, and follows a group of rebels who fight against the evil empire.

name: Interstellar
synopsis: A group of astronauts travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to find a new home for humanity.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
synopsis: Ten years after the events of Terminator, Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton) has been preparing her son, John (Edward Furlong), for his destiny as the leader of the human resistance against Skynet, a powerful artificial intelligence system that will one day rule the world. When Sarah and John are targeted for termination by a shape-shifting Terminator (Robert Patrick), they are rescued by the original Terminator (Arnold Schwarzenegger), who has been sent back from the future to protect John. Together, the three of them must stop the T-1000 from killing John and preventing the future resistance from ever being born.

name: Back to the Future
synopsis: Back to the Future is a science fiction movie released in 1985. It stars Michael J. Fox as Marty McFly, a teenage boy who is accidentally sent back in time to 1955. There, he meets his parents when they were his age and tries to prevent his mother from falling in love with his father. The movie was directed by Robert Zemeckis and written by Bob Gale. It was produced by Steven Spielberg.

name: Spirited Away
synopsis: Spirited Away is a 2001 Japanese animated fantasy film written and directed by Hayao Miyazaki, animated by Studio Ghibli for Tokuma Shoten, Nippon Television Network, Dentsu, Buena Vista Home Entertainment, Tohokushinsha Film, and distributed by Toho. The film tells the story of Chihiro Ogino, a sullen ten-year-old girl who, while moving with her parents to a new neighborhood, enters the spirit world. After her parents are turned into pigs by the witch Yubaba, Chihiro takes a job working in Yubaba's bathhouse to find a way to free herself and her parents and return to the human world.The film was a critical and commercial success, becoming the highest-grossing film in Japanese history, with a worldwide gross of over $289 million. The film won the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature at the 75th Academy Awards, making it the first and only hand-drawn and non-English-language film to win in the category, and is widely considered to be one of the greatest animated films ever made.

name: Psycho
synopsis: A young woman named Marion Crane steals $40,000 from her employer and goes on the run. She ends up at a secluded motel run by a young man named Norman Bates. Soon, Marion is dead, and Norman's mother, who he keeps locked in the house, is the primary suspect. However, as the police investigate, they uncover Norman's dark secrets and realize that he is the killer.

name: The Pianist
synopsis: The Pianist follows the story of Wladyslaw Szpilman, a Polish musician, during the Nazi occupation of Poland. Szpilman is forced into hiding and struggles to survive as he witnesses the atrocities of the war. The Pianist is a powerful and moving film about the human spirit and the triumph of hope in the face of despair.

name: LÃ©on: The Professional
synopsis: In the movie LÃ©on: The Professional, Mathilda is a twelve-year-old girl who lives in New York City with her abusive father and drug-dealing brother. Her family is killed by corrupt DEA agents, and Mathilda narrowly escapes. She seeks refuge with LÃ©on, a professional hitman who lives next door. LÃ©on takes her in and agrees to train her as his apprentice.As Mathilda learns the trade, she also falls in love with LÃ©on. However, their relationship is complicated by the fact that LÃ©on is a cold-blooded killer. When the DEA agents who killed Mathilda's family come after her, LÃ©on must choose between his love for her and his profession.

name: Parasite
synopsis: The movie Parasite is about a family of four who live in a poverty-ridden slum. The father, Ki-taek, is unemployed and the mother, Chung-sook, is a housewife. The two children, Ki-woo and Ki-jung, are both in school. One day, Ki-woo is given the opportunity to tutor the daughter of a wealthy family, the Parks.Ki-woo begins to tutor the Park daughter, and he eventually convinces the family to hire the rest of his family to work for them as well. The family starts to live a life of luxury, but as they become more entrenched in the Park's lives, they realize that they are not as different from them as they thought.The movie explores the themes of class, family, and what it means to be human.

name: The Lion King
synopsis: Simba is born into the royal family of the Pride Lands of Africa, heir to the throne. His uncle, Scar, covets the throne and plans to kill Simba and his father, King Mufasa. Scar's plot succeeds, and Simba is exiled. Simba grows into adulthood in the jungle, far from his home. He is eventually discovered by his childhood friend Nala, who convinces him to return home and take his rightful place as king. Simba defeats Scar and takes his place as king.

name: American History X
synopsis: American History X is a 1998 American crime drama film directed by Tony Kaye and written by David McKenna. It stars Edward Norton and Edward Furlong as two brothers who become involved in the neo-Nazi movement. The film was released in the United States on October 30, 1998 and was distributed by New Line Cinema. It was a commercial success, grossing $24 million worldwide, but was controversial due to its graphic depiction of violence and use of racial epithets.

name: Gladiator
synopsis: The movie Gladiator is about a man named Maximus who was a general in the Roman army. He was betrayed by the emperor and was sent into slavery. He became a gladiator and fought in the arena. He became very popular with the people and the emperor was afraid of him. Maximus wanted to take revenge on the emperor. He fought his way to the emperor and killed him.

name: The Usual Suspects
synopsis: The movie follows the interrogation of Roger "Verbal" Kint, a small-time con man who is one of only two survivors of a shoot-out on a ship docked in San Pedro Bay. He tells the story of how he and a group of criminals were recruited by a mysterious man known as Keyser SÃ¶ze to carry out a heist. The group was betrayed, and Kint is the only one who knows who betrayed them.

name: The Departed
synopsis: In The Departed, an undercover cop (Leonardo DiCaprio) and a mole in the police department (Matt Damon) attempt to outwit each other in a cat-and-mouse game of crime and betrayal. As the two men try to outsmart each other, the tension mounts and the stakes get higher, until finally, one of them makes a fatal mistake.

name: The Prestige
synopsis: The film tells the story of two 19th-century magicians, Robert Angier and Alfred Borden, who engage in a bitter and dangerous rivalry. After Angier's wife, Julia, dies in a performance gone wrong, Borden is thought to be responsible. The two men use every trick they know to ruin each other's careers. As their feud escalates, they each attempt to create the ultimate illusion, the one that will top all others. The Prestige is a story of obsession, betrayal, and deceit.

name: Casablanca
synopsis: Rick Blaine, an American expatriate, is the proprietor of an upscale nightclub and gambling den in Casablanca during the early stages of World War II. Despite the neutrality of Morocco, the city is a hotbed of political intrigue, espionage, and romance. Rick is world-weary and cynical, but he is nonetheless compelled to help his former lover, Ilsa Lund, and her resistance-leader husband, Victor Laszlo, escape the Nazis.

name: Whiplash
synopsis: Whiplash is a 2014 American drama film written and directed by Damien Chazelle. The film stars Miles Teller as Andrew Neiman, a jazz drummer who attends the prestigious Shaffer Conservatory in New York City. J.K. Simmons plays Terence Fletcher, Neiman's music instructor who is known for his unorthodox teaching methods.The film follows Neiman as he strives to become one of the best drummers in the country under Fletcher's tutelage. The two develop a volatile relationship as Fletcher pushes Neiman to his limits, both mentally and physically. The film culminates in a final showdown between the two at a prestigious music competition.Whiplash received critical acclaim upon its release, with particular praise directed towards the performances of Teller and Simmons. The film was a commercial success, grossing over $50 million against its $3.3 million budget. It won three Academy Awards, including Best Supporting Actor for Simmons.

name: The Intouchables
synopsis: In 2011, Parisian Phillip Lacasse (Francois Cluzet) is paralyzed from the neck down in a paragliding accident. His wife leaves him and he becomes depressed. His caretaker, Driss (Omar Sy), is a former convict from the projects who was hired only because he was the first person to show up for the job. Driss is not interested in being anyone's caretaker and only wants to get his welfare check so he can move out of his mother's house. However, he and Phillip form an unlikely friendship and Driss helps Phillip regain his will to live. The Intouchables is a heartwarming story of friendship and hope.

name: Modern Times
synopsis: Charlie Chaplin's "Little Tramp" character struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young woman.

name: Once Upon a Time in the West
synopsis: In the late 1800s, a mysterious stranger arrives in the town of Flagstone in the American West. The stranger, known only as Harmonica, is seeking revenge against a ruthless crime lord named Frank. Harmonica enlists the help of a former outlaw named Cheyenne to take down Frank and his gang. Once Upon a Time in the West is a classic Western film that features some of the most iconic scenes in cinema history.

name: Hara-Kiri
synopsis: In Hara-Kiri, a young ronin named Hanshiro arrives at the estate of Lord Iyi begging to commit seppuku in his courtyard. Iyi's chamberlain, Kageyu, tells Hanshiro that he must first prove his worth by telling his story. Hanshiro then recounts how he came to be a ronin and how, after being unemployed for some time, he was hired by a daimyo to work as a retainer. However, the daimyo's castle was soon besieged by another lord, and Hanshiro was forced to commit seppuku. Kageyu is unimpressed by Hanshiro's story and tells him to leave. Hanshiro then reveals that he is actually the son of Iyi's former retainer, Mitsubishi, who was forced to commit seppuku after being falsely accused of treachery. Kageyu is moved by Hanshiro's story and allows him to commit seppuku in the courtyard.

name: Grave of the Fireflies
synopsis: Setsuko and her little brother, Seita, are orphaned in the final days of World War II. With their mother dead and their father away at war, the two are left to fend for themselves in war-torn Japan. With few options and little hope, they make their way to the countryside to live with an aunt. The aunt is not equipped to care for them, and the two soon find themselves on their own again. They make a home in an abandoned bomb shelter, but their situation quickly deteriorates. Seita does whatever he can to take care of his sister, but as food becomes scarce and conditions grow more desperate, he realizes that he may not be able to save her. Grave of the Fireflies is a heart-wrenching story of love, loss, and survival in the face of impossible odds.

name: Rear Window
synopsis: A photographer named Jeff is confined to a wheelchair after an accident. To pass the time, he spends his days watching the goings-on in the apartments opposite his own. One day, he sees something suspicious in one of the apartments and becomes convinced that the tenant has murdered his wife. With the help of his girlfriend, Jeff sets out to prove his theory.

name: Alien
synopsis: The movie is set in the future where a commercial ship, the Nostromo, is on its way back to Earth when it intercepts a transmission from a nearby planet. The transmission is of an unknown origin, but it appears to be a distress signal. The ship's computer, Mother, wakes the crew from their hypersleep and they investigate the transmission. They find a crashed ship on the planet and a number of its crew are still alive. They also find a strange creature that attacks one of the crew members. The creature then takes over the ship and starts to kill the crew one by one. The remaining crew members must find a way to stop the creature before it kills them all.

name: City Lights
synopsis: A tramp falls in love with a blind girl who is selling flowers on the street. He tries to earn money to buy her a present, but is constantly thwarted by the police. Eventually, he is able to give her the present, and she regains her sight. They live happily ever after.

name: Cinema Paradiso
synopsis: In the 1950s, a young boy named Salvatore Di Vita grows up in the village of Giancaldo, Sicily, where he develops a love for film. Salvatore befriends the projectionist at the local cinema, Cinema Paradiso, and begins to help him with his work. As Salvatore grows older, he falls in love with the cinema owner's daughter, Elena, but she is soon married off to a wealthy man and moves away. Salvatore leaves Giancaldo to pursue a career in filmmaking, but returns to the village years later when he learns that the cinema is in danger of being demolished. Salvatore works to restore the cinema to its former glory and brings Elena back to the village for a final screening of one of their old films.

name: Memento
synopsis: Memento is a movie about a man named Leonard who has a condition that doesn't allow him to form new memories. He uses Polaroids and notes to keep track of his life, and is on a mission to find the man who killed his wife. Leonard's condition makes the movie very interesting and unique, as it is told in a non-linear fashion.

name: Apocalypse Now
synopsis: In the Vietnam War, Captain Benjamin Willard is sent on a dangerous mission to kill Colonel Walter Kurtz, a renegade Army officer who has gone insane. Willard's journey takes him upriver into the heart of the Cambodian jungle, where he must confront the horrors of war. Along the way, he is aided by a U.S. Army helicopter pilot named Colonel Kilgore.

name: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
synopsis: In 1936, Indiana Jones â an archaeologist and adventurer known as a " obtains a clue to the location of the Ark of the Covenant, which is believed to have magical powers. The Ark is the key to the survival of the human race, and Jones has to find it before the Nazis.Jones teams up with Marion Ravenwood, a former lover of his, and they set out on a dangerous journey to find the Ark. They are pursued by the Nazis, led by Jones's arch-rival RenÃ© Belloq, and by snakes, booby traps, and other deadly hazards.After a long and perilous quest, Jones finally finds the Ark, but Belloq and the Nazis steal it from him. Jones then has to face the ultimate test â he has to go into the Nazi stronghold and retrieve the Ark before it can be used to destroy the world. Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark is a classic adventure movie, full of excitement, suspense, and humor. Harrison Ford is perfect as the fearless and resourceful Jones, and the film's special effects are still impressive today.

name: Django Unchained
synopsis: Django is a slave who is freed by Dr. King Schultz, a German bounty hunter. Schultz is looking for the Brittle brothers, and he needs Django's help to find them. Django is happy to help, because he wants to find his wife, Broomhilda, who was sold to a plantation owner.They find the Brittle brothers and kill them. Schultz keeps his promise to Django and helps him find Broomhilda. But they are pursued by the plantation owner, Calvin Candie, and his henchmen. In the end, Django and Schultz kill Candie and rescue Broomhilda.

name: WALLÂ·E
synopsis: In the year 2805, the last trash compactor on Earth, WALLÂ·E, is still doing his job, compressing trash into cubes. One day, he finds a plant, and his life changes forever. WALLÂ·E falls in love with a sleek, modern robot named EVE, and follows her across the galaxy on a grand adventure to find out if there is still life on Earth. Along the way, WALLÂ·E and EVE discover the true meaning of love, and save the planet from destruction.

name: The Lives of Others
synopsis: The Lives of Others is a 2006 German drama film, directed by Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck. The film won the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film at the 80th Academy Awards. The title refers to the surveillance of East German citizens by agents of the Stasi, the East German secret police, during the Cold War.

name: Sunset Blvd.
synopsis: A washed up Hollywood movie star falls in love with a young, aspiring screenwriter. She convinces him to move in with her, and he quickly realizes that she is completely delusional and living in a fantasy world. She is obsessed with her past glory and refuses to let go of it. The screenwriter tries to help her come to terms with reality, but she is unwilling to let go of her fantasy world and eventually drives him away.

name: Paths of Glory
synopsis: The movie Paths of Glory is set during World War I and follows the story of French general Georges Boulanger. Boulanger is tasked with leading his troops into battle against the Germans, but the battle quickly turns into a disaster. Boulanger is blamed for the loss and is court-martialed. However, Boulanger's men stand by him and refuse to let him be executed. The movie ends with Boulanger's men marching off to battle, knowing that they may not return.

name: The Shining
synopsis: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

name: The Great Dictator
synopsis: The Great Dictator is a satirical film about Adolf Hitler and the Nazi regime. The film follows the rise of Hitler and the Nazi party, and their eventual fall from power. The film is a parody of Nazi Germany, and its propaganda machine. The film was directed by Charlie Chaplin, and starred Chaplin himself as Hitler.

name: Witness for the Prosecution
synopsis: When Leonard Vole is accused of murdering a wealthy widow, he must rely on his lawyer, Sir Wilfrid Robarts, to prove his innocence. Sir Wilfrid is known for his ability to get his clients off, but he is also known for his poor health. As the trial progresses, it becomes clear that Sir Wilfrid is not as strong as he used to be. Leonard's wife, Romaine, is also on trial for perjury. She is the only one who can clear Leonard's name, but she is unwilling to do so. The prosecutor, Sir Wilfrid, and Leonard's wife all have something to hide. The question is, who will be the witness for the prosecution?

name: Avengers: Infinity War
synopsis: Avengers: Infinity War is a 2018 superhero film based on the Marvel Comics superhero team the Avengers. The film is the sequel to The Avengers (2012) and Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015), and the nineteenth film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). The film was directed by Anthony and Joe Russo, written by Christopher Markus and Stephen McFeely, and features an ensemble cast including Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Benedict Cumberbatch, Don Cheadle, Tom Holland, Chadwick Boseman, Paul Bettany, Elizabeth Olsen, Anthony Mackie, Sebastian Stan, Danai Gurira, Letitia Wright, Dave Bautista, Zoe Saldana, Josh Brolin, and Chris Pratt. In Avengers: Infinity War, the Avengers and the Guardians of the Galaxy attempt to stop Thanos from collecting the Infinity Stones.

name: Aliens
synopsis: The movie Aliens is about a group of soldiers who are sent to investigate a distress call on a remote planet. When they get there, they are attacked by a group of aliens who are trying to kill them. The soldiers are able to fight back and eventually kill all of the aliens.

name: American Beauty
synopsis: Lester Burnham, a middle-aged man, is unhappy with his life. He is married to Carolyn, a materialistic woman who is having an affair with a real estate agent. Lester's teenage daughter, Jane, is embarrassed by her father and does not want anything to do with him. Lester's son, Ricky, is a troubled teenager who is fascinated by Lester's behavior.Lester begins to change his life after he meets his new neighbor, Angela. He becomes infatuated with her and starts to work out, quit his job, and smoke marijuana. Lester's behavior shocks his family and angers Carolyn. However, Ricky is supportive of Lester's new lifestyle and the two become friends.As Lester becomes more comfortable with his new life, he starts to act out in ways that he never would have before. He has an affair with Angela and begins to stalk her. Lester's behavior culminates in him filming Angela in the shower and masturbating to the footage.Lester's life spirals out of control and he eventually dies. His death is a turning point for his family. Carolyn realizes that she was never really happy in her marriage. Jane comes to terms with her father's death and Ricky finds a new sense of purpose.

name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
synopsis: Dr. Strangelove is a black comedy about the Cold War. The story centers on a group of American military and political leaders who are trying to stop a rogue general from launching a nuclear attack on the Soviet Union. The film satirizes the American government's policies and the way that the media portrays the Cold War.

name: The Dark Knight Rises
synopsis: Eight years after the death of District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman has disappeared. Bruce Wayne is now a recluse, living in seclusion in Wayne Manor. A new terrorist leader, Bane, overwhelzes Gotham's complete destruction. Batman must return to save Gotham.

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
synopsis: The movie is set in a universe where there are multiple Spider-People. The story follows Miles Morales, a teenager who becomes the Spider-Man of his universe after being bitten by a radioactive spider. When a villain threatens the safety of Miles and the other Spider-People, they must work together to stop him.

name: Joker
synopsis: The Joker is about a man who is struggling with mental health issues. He turns to a life of crime to make ends meet. The Joker is a dark and disturbing character who is both loved and hated by the people of Gotham City.

name: Oldboy
synopsis: Oldboy is a 2013 American action thriller film directed by Spike Lee and written by Mark Protosevich. The film stars Josh Brolin, Elizabeth Olsen, Sharlto Copley, Samuel L. Jackson, and James Ransone. It is a remake of the 2003 South Korean film of the same name.Joe Doucett (Josh Brolin) is a drunken, womanizing advertising executive who is abducted and imprisoned in a shabby hotel room for twenty years without explanation. When he is suddenly released, he embarks on a vengeful quest to find his tormentor. He is aided by Marie Sebastian (Elizabeth Olsen), a young woman who has her own dark secrets.As he gets closer to the truth, Joe discovers that his imprisonment was part of a much larger conspiracy, and that the people responsible are far more powerful than he ever could have imagined. Oldboy is a stylish, violent, and often brutal film that ultimately delivers a satisfying conclusion to its twisty story.

name: Braveheart
synopsis: The film tells the story of William Wallace, a 13th-century Scottish warrior who led the Scots in the First War of Scottish Independence against England. Wallace's father and brother are killed by the English, and Wallace himself is captured and put on trial for treason. He is executed, but his death sparks a rebellion among the Scottish people. Wallace's girlfriend, Murron, is also killed by the English, and Wallace vows revenge. He gathers an army and leads the Scots in a series of battles against the English, culminating in the Battle of Stirling Bridge. The Scots are victorious, but Wallace is betrayed by one of his own men and captured by the English. He is brought to London and put on trial again, this time for treason against the English crown. He is found guilty and executed, but his death inspires the Scots to continue fighting for their independence.

name: Amadeus
synopsis: The film tells the story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart from the perspective of his jealous contemporary, Antonio Salieri. Salieri is an older composer who has been Court Composer to the Holy Roman Emperor for many years. When Mozart comes to Vienna, Salieri is immediately impressed by his genius, and believes that Mozart is a direct instrument of God. However, Salieri is also jealous of Mozart's success, and plots to destroy him.The film chronicles the rivalry between Salieri and Mozart, as Salieri tries to sabotage Mozart's career while struggling with his own feelings of inadequacy. As Mozart's health deteriorates, Salieri is haunted by his own actions, and ultimately confesses his crimes to a priest.

name: Toy Story
synopsis: When Woody, a pullstring cowboy doll, is stolen by a greedy toy collector named Al, Buzz Lightyear, an astronaut action figure, and the other toys in Andy's room must come to the rescue. They embark on a daring mission to save their friend and get him back to Andy's room before Andy's birthday party. Along the way, the toys encounter many obstacles, including a terrifying dog, a sadistic next-door neighbor, and a ruthless toy collector. But with the help of some new friends, they just might be able to pull off the greatest rescue mission in toy history.

name: The Boat
synopsis: When the SS takes control of a small town in Norway, the residents are forced to work in a factory that produces German war supplies. The town's children are also taken away and sent to a Nazi school. One resident, a fisherman, decides to build a boat and sail away to freedom. With the help of his wife and son, he completes the boat and sets sail. However, the SS soon discovers their escape plan and sends a ship to stop them. In a dramatic chase, the fisherman and his family are able to outrun the Nazis and reach freedom.

name: Coco
synopsis: In the movie Coco, twelve-year-old Miguel Rivera is accidentally transported to the land of the dead, where he seeks the help of his deceased musician great-great-grandfather to return him to his family among the living.

name: Inglourious Basterds
synopsis: In the opening scene, Colonel Hans Landa of the SS interrogates French dairy farmer Perrier LaPadite about the whereabouts of the Dreyfus family. LaPadite tells Landa that the Dreyfuses have fled to London, and Landa leaves.In London, British Lieutenant Archie Hicox is meeting with intelligence officer Lt. General Edward Smith-Dorrien. Hicox is assigned to infiltrate a German pub in Paris and kill Nazis, with the help of the British First Army.Meanwhile, in Paris, Shosanna Dreyfus witnesses the brutal execution of her family at the hands of Colonel Landa. Shosanna manages to escape and flees to a cinema where she takes refuge.Under the alias "Emmanuelle Mimieux", Shosanna becomes the owner and projectionist of the cinema.In the meantime, Lieutenant Hicox and a team of British soldiers pose as German soldiers in order to infiltrate the pub in Paris. However, their cover is blown and a shootout ensues, in which Hicox and all the British soldiers are killed. Colonel Landa arrives at the pub and interrogates the sole surviving British soldier, Private First Class Aldo Raine. Raine tells Landa about "The Basterds", a group of Jewish-American soldiers who are on a mission to kill as many Nazis as possible.Landa then goes to the cinema where Shosanna is working. He flirts with her and asks her out on a date, but she refuses.Later, the Basterds, led by Aldo Raine, carry out a massacre of Italian soldiers in a small town in the Alps. They then scalping their victims and carving swastikas into their foreheads.The Basterds then plan to assassinate Nazi leaders at a big movie premiere in Paris, which Shosanna is scheduled to attend.At the premiere, Shosanna is horrified to see Colonel Landa in attendance. However, she goes through with her plan and sets the cinema on fire, killing everyone inside, including the Nazi leaders.In the final scene, Aldo Raine and his men track down Colonel Landa to a house in the woods. Landa pleads for his life, but Raine orders his men to kill him.

name: Princess Mononoke
synopsis: A young woman named San, who was raised by wolves, finds herself in the middle of a battle between the forest Gods and the humans who want to destroy the forest. San must choose sides in the battle and find out who she really is.

name: Once Upon a Time in America
synopsis: In the early 1900s, a young immigrant named Noodles arrives in New York City with nothing but the clothes on his back. He quickly falls in with a group of other young immigrants, and together they make a life for themselves on the mean streets of the city.As the years go by, Noodles and his friends rise up in the criminal underworld, becoming powerful gangsters. But just as they are on the verge of achieving their dreams, tragedy strikes, threatening to destroy everything they have built.Once Upon a Time in America is the epic story of Noodles and his friends, and of the city that shaped them. It is a sweeping tale of love, loss, betrayal, and redemption that is both heartbreaking and ultimately hopeful.

name: Avengers: Endgame
synopsis: The Avengers: Endgame is a 2019 American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics superhero team the Avengers, produced by Marvel Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures. It is the direct sequel to The Avengers (2012) and Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015), and the 22nd film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). The film was directed by Anthony and Joe Russo, written by Christopher Markus and Stephen McFeely, and features an ensemble cast including Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner, Don Cheadle, Paul Rudd, Brie Larson, Karen Gillan, Danai Gurira, Bradley Cooper, and Josh Brolin. In Avengers: Endgame, the Avengers and their allies attempt to reverse the damage caused by Thanos in Infinity War.The film was announced in October 2014 as Avengers: Infinity War â Part 2. The Russo brothers came on board as directors in April 2015, and by May, Markus and McFeely signed on to write the script for the film. In July 2016, Marvel shortened the title to Avengers: Infinity War. Filming began in August 2017 at Pinewood Atlanta Studios in Fayette County, Georgia, and lasted until January 2018. Additional filming took place in the United Kingdom, the United States, and New Zealand.

name: Good Will Hunting
synopsis: Genius Will Hunting has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

name: Requiem for a Dream
synopsis: The film tells the story of four people whose lives are ravaged by drug addiction. Harry Goldfarb is a young man who dreams of making it big as a filmmaker, but his drug use gets in the way. His girlfriend Marion Silver is also addicted to drugs, and she turns to prostitution to support her habit. Harry's mother Sara is addicted to diet pills, and she becomes increasingly obsessed with losing weight. Lastly, Harry's friend Tyrone C. Love is a heroin addict who turns to crime to support his habit. The film follows the descent of each character into their own personal hells as their addictions take over their lives.

name: Toy Story 3
synopsis: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

name: Singin' in the Rain
synopsis: The film is set in Hollywood, 1927, the height of the silent film era. Don Lockwood is a famous silent film star with a great voice, but no one knows it. Cosmo Brown is his best friend and pianist. One day, Don and Cosmo witness the premiere of a new talking picture, The Jazz Singer. They are both unimpressed.Don's next film, The Royal Rascal, is being released as a silent film, but Don is supposed to do a screen test for the talkies. Don is nervous and his voice is terrible, but the studio head, R.F. Simpson, decides to release the film as a silent anyway.Don's leading lady in The Royal Rascal is the beautiful but vapid Lina Lamont. Lina is furious when she finds out the film is being released as a silent, and she demands that Don do something to make her look good.Don's solution is to have Cosmo dub Lina's voice in the film. It's a huge success, and Lina is none the wiser.As the film's release approaches, Don begins a romance with budding actress Kathy Selden. Kathy is everything that Lina is not - talented, down-to-earth, and beautiful.On opening night, The Royal Rascal is a hit, and Lina's terrible voice is finally exposed. Don and Kathy are thrilled, and they ride off into the sunset together.

name: Your Name.
synopsis: Mitsuha is a high school girl who lives in a small town in the countryside. She is tired of her life and wishes to be a handsome boy in Tokyo. One day, her wish comes true and she wakes up in the body of a boy named Taki. Taki is a high school boy who lives in Tokyo. He is surprised to find himself in Mitsuha's body, but he goes along with it. They switch bodies randomly and don't know when it will happen. They start to communicate with each other by leaving messages on their phones. As they get to know each other, they start to develop feelings for each other. However, they are unable to meet each other in person as they live in different places. One day, they find out that they will never be able to switch bodies again. They are heartbroken but decide to meet each other one last time. They finally meet and confess their feelings for each other. They spend one last day together before they go their separate ways.

name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
synopsis: The movie begins with Darth Vader and the Galactic Empire preparing to attack the Rebel Alliance's secret base on the forest moon of Endor. Vader has captured Luke Skywalker, who he plans to use as bait to trap Luke's friends and destroy the Rebel Alliance. Meanwhile, the Rebel fleet has massed near Endor in preparation for a final assault on the Empire's second Death Star. Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Han Solo, Chewbacca, and the droids R2-D2 and C-3PO are on a mission to Endor to destroy the Death Star's shield generator, allowing the Rebel fleet to attack and destroy the Death Star. They are accompanied by a squad of rebel commandos.On Endor, they are discovered by the Empire's stormtroopers, but they manage to escape and make their way to the shield generator. There, they are captured by a group of Ewoks, who mistake them for enemies. The Ewoks eventually realize that Luke, Leia, Han, and the others are friends, and they help them destroy the shield generator.With the Death Star's shield down, the Rebel fleet attacks and destroys the Death Star, dealing a crippling blow to the Empire. Darth Vader is killed in the battle, and Luke destroys the Emperor. With the Empire defeated, Luke and the others celebrate their victory.

name: 3 Idiots
synopsis: The movie 3 Idiots is a story about 3 friends who are in college together and their journey through life. The friends are Raju, Farhan, and Rancho. They all have different dreams and aspirations, but they all want to change the world in their own way. The movie follows their journey as they face different challenges and obstacles in their quest to achieve their goals. Along the way, they learn valuable life lessons and discover what is truly important to them. In the end, they realize that the most important thing is not what they achieve, but who they become along the way.

name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
synopsis: The movie 2001: A Space Odyssey is about a space expedition that goes wrong. The crew of the spaceship is forced to land on a strange planet. They are then attacked by a group of aliens. The crew is able to fight off the aliens and make it back to their ship.

name: Reservoir Dogs
synopsis: After a heist goes wrong, a group of criminals begin to suspect that one of their own is a police informant. Tensions mount as they try to figure out who the traitor is, and things quickly spiral out of control.

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
synopsis: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind is a 2004 American romantic science fiction comedy-drama film directed by Michel Gondry and written by Charlie Kaufman. It follows an estranged couple who have erased each other from their memories, but begin to re-experience their past together as they start to remember what happened.

name: High and Low
synopsis: When a wealthy man's son is kidnapped, he cooperates with the police to pay the ransom but is horrified to discover that the kidnappers have the wrong boy. Desperate to find his son, he employs a private detective to help him track down the kidnappers. As the search intensifies, the man begins to lose hope of ever finding his son alive.

name: Citizen Kane
synopsis: A group of reporters are investigating the life of Charles Foster Kane, a wealthy man who built his empire through shady business deals. They interview Kane's friends and enemies, and piecing together his life story. Kane was born into poverty, but was taken in by a wealthy family. He married a woman for her money, but she left him after she found out he was having an affair. Kane then married a woman who he truly loved, but she died in an accident. Kane was never the same after that, and his empire slowly crumbled. He died alone, and the reporters are left wondering what the last word he said meant.

name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
synopsis: Spider-Man: No Way Home is a 2021 American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character Spider-Man, co-produced by Columbia Pictures and Marvel Studios, and distributed by Sony Pictures Releasing. It is the sequel to Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) and Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019), and the 27th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). The film is directed by Jon Watts, written by Chris McKenna and Erik Sommers, and stars Tom Holland as Peter Parker / Spider-Man, alongside Zendaya, Jacob Batalon, Tony Revolori, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jamie Foxx, Alfred Molina, and Marisa Tomei. In Spider-Man: No Way Home, Parker is recruited by Doctor Strange to face Mysterio, who is revealed to be a multiverse villain.Development of a third Spider-Man film in the MCU began in June 2019, with Holland and Watts returning to direct and write, respectively. The following December, it was confirmed that the film would be titled Spider-Man: No Way Home, with McKenna and Sommers hired to write the screenplay. Production began in New York City in February 2021. Spider-Man: No Way Home is scheduled to be released in the United States on December 17, 2021, in IMAX.

name: Capernaum
synopsis: 12-year-old Zain is a Beirut street kid who has never had an easy life. He's been in and out of jail for various petty crimes, and he's been mistreated by just about everyone he's ever encountered. When his younger sister is sold by their mother into marriage, Zain is finally pushed over the edge. He kidnaps his baby nephew and sets out on a journey to find a way out of the city and a better life for the child. Along the way, he meets a Ethiopian migrant worker named Rahil and her young son Yonas, and the three of them form an unlikely family. But things take a turn for the worse when Zain is arrested and thrown in jail, and it's up to Rahil and Yonas to find a way to get him out. Capernaum is a heart-wrenching story of survival and hope in the face of incredible odds.

name: Lawrence of Arabia
synopsis: The film tells the story of T.E. Lawrence, a British Army officer during World War I. Lawrence was sent to Arabia on a secret mission to help the Arab people overthrow the Ottoman Empire. Lawrence quickly becomes a leader among the Arabs and leads them in a series of daring attacks against the Turks. The Arabs are successful in driving the Turks out of Arabia and Lawrence becomes a hero.

name: M
synopsis: ementoMemento is a 2000 American neo-noir psychological thriller film written and directed by Christopher Nolan, and produced by Suzanne and Jennifer Todd. The film's script was based on a pitch by Jonathan Nolan, who later wrote the story "Memento Mori" from the concept. It stars Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, and Joe Pantoliano. Pearce plays Leonard Shelby, a man with anterograde amnesia, which impairs his ability to form new memories, as he hunts for the man he believes raped and murdered his wife, which is the last thing he remembers. The two main sequences of the film are interwoven in such a way that they support each other. One is presented in black and white and is told in reverse chronological order (hence its title, "Memento Mori"), and the other is in color and shown in chronological order.

name: North by Northwest
synopsis: In North by Northwest, Roger Thornhill, a successful advertising executive, is mistaken for a government agent and is pursued across the country by foreign spies. He is rescued by a beautiful woman, Eve Kendall, who turns out to be part of the plot against him. Thornhill eventually uncovers a plot to steal government secrets and thwart the spies.

name: The Hunt
synopsis: for Red OctoberIn the movie, a Soviet nuclear submarine is heading towards the U.S. coast carrying a nuclear missile. The submarine's captain, Marko Ramius, is a skilled and experienced officer who wants to defect to the United States. The Soviet government sends a team of assassins to kill him, but Ramius is one step ahead of them. He takes the submarine into American waters, where the U.S. Navy is dispatched to track it down. The Navy is led by Jack Ryan, a young analyst who has never been in combat before. As the two forces close in on each other, the stakes get higher and higher, until finally the submarine is surrounded by the U.S. Navy and forced to surface. Ramius and his crew are taken into custody, and the world is saved from a nuclear catastrophe.

name: Vertigo
synopsis: Alfred Hitchcock's Vertigo is the story of a man (James Stewart) who is haunted by the memory of a woman (Kim Novak) he once loved. After she dies, he is drawn to her doppelganger, a woman who looks exactly like her. As he tries to unravel the mystery of her death, he finds himself falling in love with her again.

name: AmÃ©lie
synopsis: AmÃ©lie is a young woman who lives in Paris. She is an introvert and has a very active imagination. She spends her days working in a cafe and her nights exploring the city. She is content with her life until she meets a man named Nino. Nino is a photographer who is also an introvert. He is different from anyone she has ever met and she is immediately drawn to him. They become friends and AmÃ©lie starts to feel more alive than she ever has before. When Nino is diagnosed with cancer, AmÃ©lie is determined to make his last days the best of his life. She sets out on a mission to make everyone around her happy. In the process, she finds herself and learns to love life.

name: A Clockwork Orange
synopsis: A Clockwork Orange is a 1971 dystopian crime film directed, produced, and written by Stanley Kubrick, based on Anthony Burgess's 1962 novel of the same name. It employing disturbing, violent images to comment on psychiatry, juvenile delinquency, youth gangs, and other social, political, and economic subjects in a dystopian near-future Britain. Alex (Malcolm McDowell), a charismatic, sociopathic delinquent, is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem - but not all goes according to plan.

name: Come and See
synopsis: A young Belarusian man named Florya is drafted into the Soviet army to fight the Germans during World War II. He experiences the horror of war and the destruction of his hometown, as well as the death of his friends and family. The film follows Florya's journey as he tries to survive the war and the atrocities he witnesses.

name: Full Metal Jacket
synopsis: In Full Metal Jacket, a group of Marine Corps recruits are brought to Parris Island for basic training. There, they are put through a grueling training regimen by their drill sergeant, Gunnery Sergeant Hartman. The recruits must learn to work together as a team in order to survive the training and ultimately, the Vietnam War. Full Metal Jacket is a gritty and realistic portrayal of the Marine Corps training experience and the horrors of war.

name: Double Indemnity
synopsis: Walter Neff is an insurance salesman who meets the beautiful Phyllis Dietrichson while selling her husband an accident policy. Phyllis is unhappy in her marriage and convinces Walter to help her kill her husband so they can collect on the double indemnity clause in the policy. As they carry out their plan, their mutual attraction grows, and they begin to worry that they will be caught. When Phyllis's husband's death appears to be suspicious, the insurance company sends an investigator, who begins to piece together the truth. As the net closes in on them, Phyllis and Walter contemplate murder once again.

name: The Apartment
synopsis: The film tells the story of Bud Baxter, a young man working in the mail room of an insurance company in New York City. Bud's ambition is to work in the company's executive suite. To achieve this, he loans his apartment to his superiors for their extramarital trysts. Eventually, Bud's apartment becomes the place where company president Jeff D. Sheldrake rendezvous with his mistress, Fran Kubelik. Bud becomes attracted to Fran, and Sheldrake learns of the affair, leading to Bud's demotion. Fran breaks up with Sheldrake and intends to leave the city. Bud asks her to marry him and she accepts. When Sheldrake learns of Bud and Fran's engagement, he blackmails Bud into ending the relationship or he will have him fired. Bud ends the engagement, much to Fran's heartbreak.
